text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today is tryouts—an important event<n>to determine the future
of Tracen<n>students ready to take their game to<n>the next
level.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Eager up-and-comers have<n>assembled at the track, hoping
to<n>break away from the pack and make<n>their formal debut.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Wow, would ya look at this crowd!<n>It's just like a party!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Since everybody's here, maybe we<n>ought to have a
barbecue after the<n>race!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: How 'bout you, partner? You in?

text_block_list.name: Timid Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Huh? Um... I think I'll have to pass...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Aww, really? That's a shame. Maybe<n>next week then.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Among them, one particular<n>Umamusume stands out in a
different<n>way.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Taiki Shuttle... The talent's definitely<n>there, but she could
stand to exercise<n>a bit more self-control.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
She does tend to bungle her starts,<n>even in scrimmages. I
wonder how<n>she'll fare today?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: At long last, the race begins with all<n>eyes on Taiki Shuttle.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yeehaaaaaw!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And here comes Taiki Shuttle! Just<n>look at her go! That is
some awesome<n>speed, folks!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her sprint at the outset is indeed a<n>sight to behold.
However...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Huh?

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Oh, what's this? Taiki Shuttle appears<n>to be losing steam!
She's slowly<n>falling behind in the homestretch!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
What?! Of all the times to get<n>distracted! What is she
thinking?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, it looks like her lack of focus is<n>the main thing holding
her back.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the end, she fails to claim a<n>satisfactory position in the
rankings.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Upon leaving the venue, I spot a<n>figure wobbling out of the
corner of<n>my eye.

text_block_list.name: Timid Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Urgh... My head is spinning...

text_block_list.name: Timid Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Eek!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seemingly unwell, she stumbles and<n>starts to fall. But just
as I try to rush<n>over...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Daaash!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A blur immediately speeds past me.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: And caaatch!

text_block_list.name: Timid Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With breathtaking speed, Taiki flies<n>over like a gust of wind
to make a<n>spectacular save.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Good! Made it in the nick of time!

text_block_list.name: Timid Umamusume
text_block_list.text: W-wait, what? Taiki Shuttle?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
I thought ya seemed a tad under the<n>weather earlier. It ain't
good to push<n>yourself too hard!

text_block_list.name: Timid Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Y-you noticed?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yes, of course I did!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Now, we'd better get ya to the nurse.<n>Here—climb on up and
hold on tight,<n>okay?

text_block_list.name: Timid Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Okay, here we go! Make way,<n>everybody! Medical
emergency,<n>comin' through!

text_block_list.name: Timid Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Aaahh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Taiki takes off running again at such<n>a tremendous pace
that it's hard to<n>believe she's carrying someone on<n>her
back!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Filled with a mix of curiosity and<n>concern, I follow after
them.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I'm so glad it's nothing serious! Take<n>care now, ya hear?

text_block_list.name: Timid Umamusume
text_block_list.text: I will! Thanks, Taiki! See you later!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: See ya!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I'm so happy to see her<n>smilin'! Life's good when<n>
everybody's happy!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: ...Oh! How long have you been there?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Me? Wait, that badge on your collar...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Don't tell me... I'm being scouted?!<n>That's gotta be what
this is!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Yeehaaaaaw! Yes, yes, a thousand<n>times yes! I'm so
happy!
choice_data_list: Wait, I didn't say anything abou—

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
I gotta go send a letter to my family!<n>And all my friends back
home too!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ooh, and this calls for a party! You're<n>invited too, of course!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: You can always count on some goodeatin' at one of my barbecues!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Let's get all the details ironed out<n>tomorrow! We'll be
training partners<n>from now on, after all!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Welp, see ya tomorrow, Trainer! I<n>can't wait to get this
show on the<n>road!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With a final cheerful wave of her<n>hand, Taiki flies off like a
whirlwind.
